connector.description: Send message to an AWS SNS FIFO Topic.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.topicNam.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.topicNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.topicNam.description: The SNS Topic name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.accessKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.accessKe.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.secretKe.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.secretKe.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.contentB.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.contentBasedDeduplication
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.contentB.description: Use content-based deduplication (should be enabled in the SQS FIFO queue first)

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.autoCrea.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.autoCreateTopic
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.autoCrea.description: Setting the autocreation of the SNS topic.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useDefau.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useDefau.description: Set whether the SNS client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useProfi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useProfi.description: Set whether the SNS client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useSessi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.useSessi.description: Set whether the SNS client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in situation in which the user needs to assume a IAM role for doing operations in SNS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.profileC.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.profileC.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.sessionT.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.sessionT.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume a IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.uriEndpo.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.uriEndpo.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.override.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-sns-fifo-sink.override.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
